code: rent <- seq(2300, 4000, by = 100)  foo <- function(house_value, rent){   ans <- monthly_cost(house_value = house_value,                        property_tax = 2.5/100,                        annual_other_tax = 6000,                        monthly_hoa_fee = 250,                        monthly_home_insurance = 150,                        monthly_utility_fee = 300,                        closing_fee = house_value * 0.07,                       year = 10,                        saving_rate = 0.03,                        down_payment = 0.2,                       mortgage_rate = 5.75/100,                       morrgage_year = 30)   return(ans - rent) }  ans <- lapply(rent,                function(x){return(uniroot(foo, rent = x, interval = c(1e5, 1e6))$root)})  do.call(rbind, ans) %>%    as.data.frame() %>%    mutate(rent = rent) %>%    rename(`house value` = V1) %>%    select(`house value`, rent) %>%    gt()
